subject: Pedals Pro X Ultra
description_text:
Good evening,
I received my pedals today and after connecting to the manager, an upgrade
was done.
My first problem is that I cannot control the led's with the manager. If I
sync, the manager gets the configuration from the pedals, that's it.
On the manager, I change colors or modes, even trying to turn them off,
and nothing happens on the pedals side (just the same mode that started
when I first connected the pedals).

The second issue is that with Simhub the pedals are detected as the Haptics
and not as pedals, even when I still do not have the haptics. Is
this normal?
The haptics I will just buy if the pedals are a good choice for me.

Thank you for your cooperation. I tried on the website to register my
product but I found nothing. Is there a link to add my product to my
account?

Best regards,
Alexandre Cardoso

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexandre Cardoso,     Please provide your order number. Also, please uninstall the current software version on your computer, then download and install the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. After installation, update the firmware again and test it.       https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hi again,
I uninstalled Manager 2.1.2 and installed it again. But after installation
I don't know how to update the firmware again because it was done before
and I don't know where I can download the file to make it manually. Your
website has little information about software.
The issue remains the same as before.

I just made exactly the same as I made before. Excluding the firmware
update, that I know from experience, we should not be flashing it all the
time. My system is very stable but the led control of the pedals is really
not working.

The manual of the pedals is also very limited when concerning the led
connections and diagnostic.

Best regards,
Alexandre Cardoso
